level.heading: ISSUANCE AND FEES FOR REPLACEMENT DC ONE CARDS (ยง 1-5701)

level.text: The Office of the Chief Technology Officer (OCTO) shall issue replacement DC One Cards.
OCTO shall charge a non-refundable fee of five ($5) for the replacement of each DC One Card that contains an electronic chip.
Cardholders may pay the replacement fee by major credit card or money order.
Source: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 9512 (November 11, 2011).
